00003 #include "ORTrig4ChanShaperFilter.hh"

00009 ORTrig4ChanShaperFilter::ORTrig4ChanShaperFilter()
00010 {
00011   SetComponentBreakReturnsFailure();
00012   
00013   fTimeCutLength = 0.0005;// in units of secs
00014   f64PDHistDrawer = new OR64PDHistDrawer(&fShaperDecoder);
00015   AddProcessor(f64PDHistDrawer);
00016 
00017 
00018   fShaperTreeWriter = new ORBasicTreeWriter(&fShaperDecoder, "shaperFilterTree");
00019   AddProcessor(fShaperTreeWriter);
00020   
00021   fTriggerTreeWriter = new ORTrig4ChanTreeWriter("triggerFilterTree");
00022   AddProcessor(fTriggerTreeWriter);
00023   
00024   fLastTriggerRecordPtr = NULL;
00025   fTempShaperRecordPtr = NULL;
00026    Reset = 0;
00027 }
00028 
00029 ORTrig4ChanShaperFilter::~ORTrig4ChanShaperFilter()
00030 {
00031   if(fLastTriggerRecordPtr != NULL) {
00032     delete[] fLastTriggerRecordPtr;
00033   }
00034   if(fTempShaperRecordPtr != NULL) {
00035     delete[] fTempShaperRecordPtr;
00036   }
00037   
00038   delete f64PDHistDrawer;
00039   delete fShaperTreeWriter;
00040   delete fTriggerTreeWriter;
00041 }
00042 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORTrig4ChanShaperFilter::StartRun()
00043 {
00044   fShaperDataId = fShaperTreeWriter->GetDataId();
00045   fTriggerDataId = fTriggerTreeWriter->GetDataId();
00046   
00047   return ORCompoundDataProcessor::StartRun();
00048 }
00049 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORTrig4ChanShaperFilter::ProcessDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00050 {
00051   UInt_t thisDataId = fShaperDecoder.DataIdOf(record);
00052  
00053   if( thisDataId == fShaperDataId ) {
00054      Reset++;
00055     if (fTempShaperRecordPtr==NULL) { 
00056        fShaperRecordLength = fShaperDecoder.LengthOf(record);
00057     }
00058     UInt_t tagNoise = 0;
00059     fThisTriggerTime = (Double_t)fTriggerDecoder.ClockOf(fLastTriggerRecordPtr)/50000000.0;
00060     fThisCard = fShaperDecoder.CardOf(record);  
00061     fThisChannel = fShaperDecoder.ChannelOf(record);
00062     if ( fBothRecords.size() > 0 ) {
00063       //iterator to tag records old enough to delete
00064       multimap<Double_t, UInt_t*>::iterator del_It= fBothRecords.begin();
00065 
00066       for (multimap<Double_t, UInt_t*>::iterator it = fBothRecords.begin();
00067          it != fBothRecords.end();
00068          ++it) {
00069         fMapTriggerTime = it->first;
00070         if ( fThisTriggerTime - fMapTriggerTime > fTimeCutLength ) {
00071            //done with old records
00072             delete[] it->second;
00073             it->second = NULL;
00074             //save iterator location of last record to erase 
00075             del_It++;
00076          } else { //within time cut
00077           fLastCard = fShaperDecoder.CardOf(it->second);  
00078           fLastChannel = fShaperDecoder.ChannelOf(it->second);
00079           if ( fThisTriggerTime >= fMapTriggerTime ) {
00080              //normal order events
00081              if ( fThisCard == fLastCard ) {
00082                 if ( fThisChannel == fLastChannel ) {
00083                    tagNoise = 1;//don't print current record
00084                 }
00085              }
00086           } else { 
00087              //correct for out of order events
00088              ORLog(kDebug) << "Cut Triggers coming out of order!" << endl;
00089              ORLog(kDebug) << "Processing record " << fThisTriggerTime  << endl;
00090              ORLog(kDebug) << "Map record Time " << fMapTriggerTime << endl;
00091              ORLog(kDebug) << "Difference " << fThisTriggerTime - fMapTriggerTime << endl;
00092              ORLog(kDebug) << "Reset " << Reset << endl;
00093              if (fMapTriggerTime - fThisTriggerTime > fTimeCutLength ) {
00094                 if ( fThisCard == fLastCard ) {
00095                    if ( fThisChannel == fLastChannel ) {
00096                       tagNoise = 1;//don't print current record
00097                    }
00098                 }
00099              }
00100              
00101           }
00102         }
00103       }
00104       //records are automatically sorted by multimap, erase everything up to del_It
00105       fBothRecords.erase(fBothRecords.begin(), del_It);
00106     }
00107     if ( tagNoise == 0 ) {
00108       if (!fDoProcess || !fDoProcessRun) return kFailure;
00109       //add time to hist BEFORE adding shaper record
00110       EReturnCode retCode = f64PDHistDrawer->ProcessRecordTime(fThisTriggerTime);
00111       if (retCode == kBreak) return fBreakRetCode;
00112       if (retCode >= kAlarm) return retCode;      
00113       //add this shaper record to hist
00114       retCode = f64PDHistDrawer->ProcessDataRecord(record); 
00115       if (retCode == kBreak) return fBreakRetCode;
00116       if (retCode >= kAlarm) return retCode;      
00117       retCode = fShaperTreeWriter->ProcessDataRecord(record); 
00118       if (retCode == kBreak) return fBreakRetCode;
00119       if (retCode >= kAlarm) return retCode;      
00120       retCode = fTriggerTreeWriter->ProcessDataRecord(fLastTriggerRecordPtr); 
00121       if (retCode == kBreak) return fBreakRetCode;
00122       if (retCode >= kAlarm) return retCode;      
00123     }
00124     //now add this record to fBothRecords
00125     fTempShaperRecordPtr = new UInt_t[fShaperRecordLength]; 
00126     memcpy(fTempShaperRecordPtr, record, fShaperRecordLength*sizeof(UInt_t));
00127     fBothRecords.insert(pair<Double_t, UInt_t*>(fThisTriggerTime, fTempShaperRecordPtr) );
00128     fLastRecordDataId = thisDataId;  
00129   } else if( thisDataId == fTriggerDataId ) {
00130      Reset = 0;
00131     if (fLastTriggerRecordPtr==NULL) { 
00132       /* if not allocated, reallocate a buffer and then copy. */
00133       fTriggerRecordLength = fShaperDecoder.LengthOf(record);
00134       fLastTriggerRecordPtr = new UInt_t[fTriggerRecordLength];  
00135        ORLog(kDebug) << "Trigger Length" << fTriggerRecordLength << endl;
00136     }
00137     /* copy */
00138     memcpy(fLastTriggerRecordPtr, record, fTriggerRecordLength*sizeof(UInt_t));
00139     fLastRecordDataId = thisDataId;  
00140   } 
00141   
00142   return kSuccess;
00143 
00144 }
00145 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORTrig4ChanShaperFilter::EndRun()
00146 {
00147   if ( fBothRecords.size() > 0 ) {
00148     for (multimap<Double_t, UInt_t*>::iterator it = fBothRecords.begin();
00149         it != fBothRecords.end();
00150         ++it) {
00151       if( it->second != NULL ){
00152         delete[] it->second;        
00153         it->second = NULL;
00154       }
00155     }
00156     fBothRecords.clear();
00157   }
00158   
00159   
00160   if(fLastTriggerRecordPtr != NULL) {
00161     delete[] fLastTriggerRecordPtr;
00162     fLastTriggerRecordPtr = NULL;
00163   }
00164   if(fTempShaperRecordPtr != NULL) {
00165     //delete[] fTempShaperRecordPtr;//deleted by map
00166     fTempShaperRecordPtr = NULL;
00167   }
00168   
00169   return ORCompoundDataProcessor::EndRun();
00170 }
00171 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORTrig4ChanShaperFilter::EndProcessing()
00172 {
00173   if ( fBothRecords.size() > 0 ) {
00174     for (multimap<Double_t, UInt_t*>::iterator it = fBothRecords.begin();
00175       it != fBothRecords.end();
00176       ++it) {
00177       if( it->second != NULL ){
00178         delete[] it->second;        
00179         it->second = NULL;
00180       }
00181     }
00182     fBothRecords.clear();
00183   }
00184   return ORCompoundDataProcessor::EndProcessing();
00185 }
